projects.title: Pet Clinic
projects.bodyText:
- Microservice based business application for a pet clinic which is divided into teams, requiring communication and teamwork to have it all come together.
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Was responsible for the service of billing within the microservice, troubleshooting, updating, debugging issues, working with front-end and back-end.

projects.title: Halal Bites
projects.bodyText:
- Website/microservice based system for halal/kosher restaurants owners to easily have clients go to one location to find them. 
 -
